title: Citigroup CFO Mark Mason to Present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference
summary: New York - Mark Mason, Chief Financial Officer of Citigroup, will present at the Barclays Global Financial Services Conference on Monday, September 9, 2019. The presentation is expected to begin at approximately 2 p.m. (Eastern). A live webcast will be available at www.citigroup.com/global/investors. A replay and transcript of the webcast will be available shortly after the event.
